display.title: Market
display.description:
Farming for Blockheads adds a Market block to Minecraft, allowing you to buy seeds, saplings or other things such as bone meal. Emeralds are the favored currency! The market allows searching and scrolling through trades and can filter by category.

It also adds some farming utilties such as a Chicken Nest, a Feeding Trough, and Fertilizers to improve your crops.
